shorts.title: Pa. woman, son charged in ballot-tampering investigation

shorts.description: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content_distilled: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency  has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II  production contract  awarded to Gentex Corporation.

shorts.title: Three injured, one in custody after stabbing in Scranton, police say
shorts.title_distilled: Three injured, one in custody after stabbing in Scranton, police say.
shorts.description: Scranton Police are investigating a stabbing at the Jermyn Apartments on Tuesday night; three are injured, and one is in custody.
shorts.content: Scranton Police are investigating a stabbing at the Jermyn Apartments on Tuesday night; three are injured, and one is in custody.
shorts.content_distilled: Scranton Police are investigating a stabbing at the Jermyn Apartments on Tuesday night; three are injured, and one is in custody.

shorts.title: Hundreds of kids receive holiday gifts through local Christmas event in Carbondale
shorts.title_distilled: Hundreds of kids receive holiday gifts through local Christmas event in Carbondale.
shorts.description: Kids received winter essentials like coats, hats, gloves, and scarves, and their families could select gifts for them this Christmas.

shorts.title: President Trump rallies crowd at Mount Airy Casino in the Poconos
shorts.title_distilled: President Trump rallies crowd at Mount Airy Casino in the Poconos.
shorts.description: PARADISE TOWNSHIP, MONROE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — President Donald Trump took to the stage in the Poconos, touting his economic agenda and how he plans to tackle inflation and higher prices. President Trump visited northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday to talk about affordability, an issue that polls show has many Americans concerned. He held a rally at [...]

shorts.title: Police say 3 people stabbed, suspect in custody in Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: Police say 3 people stabbed, suspect in custody in Scranton.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Scranton Police told 28/22 News Tuesday night that three people were stabbed and a potential suspect is in custody. 28/22 News was there Tuesday night, as several police cars were seen at the corner of Wyoming Avenue and Penn Avenue around 7:30 p.m. The Scranton Police Department says they're investigating [...]
shorts.content: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Scranton Police told 28/22 News Tuesday night that three people were stabbed and a potential suspect is in custody. 28/22 News was there Tuesday night, as several police cars were seen at the corner of Wyoming Avenue and Penn Avenue around 7:30 p.m. The Scranton Police Department says they're investigating [...]
shorts.content_distilled: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY  — Scranton Police told 28/22 News Tuesday night that three people were stabbed and a potential suspect is in custody.
